reference.title: Advanced SIMD and floating-point registers
reference.shortdesc: This chapter describes the Advanced SIMD and floating-point registers.

link.desc: The core has several Advanced SIMD and floating-point system registers in the AArch64 execution state. Each register has a specific purpose, specific usage constraints, configurations, and attributes.
The FPSR provides floating-point system status information.

link.linktext: MVFR0_EL1, Media and VFP Feature Register 0, EL1
link.desc: The MVFR0_EL1 describes the features provided by the AArch64 Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation.

link.linktext: MVFR1_EL1, Media and VFP Feature Register 1, EL1
link.desc: The MVFR1_EL1 describes the features provided by the AArch64 Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation.

link.linktext: MVFR2_EL1, Media and VFP Feature Register 2, EL1
link.desc: The MVFR2_EL1 describes the features provided by the AArch64 Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation.
The core has one Advanced SIMD and floating-point system registers in the AArch32 execution state.

link.linktext: FPSCR, Floating-Point Status and Control Register
link.desc: The FPSCR provides floating-point system status information and control.
